<<<<<<< HEAD
The Humble representation and address to His Highness of several churches & Christians in South--VVales, and Monmouth-Shire. Presented Thursday January 31.
[2], 14 p.
Printed by Henry Hills and John Field; printers to His Highness, London, : MDCLVI [1656]
A reply to: A word for God. Or a testimony on truths behalf. Annotation on Thomason copy: "& printed 9th Feb: 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
